objects.description: [PUBLOAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1228) has used RC4 encryption in C2 communications.(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024)(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)
